::Prowl::

Prowl looks over at IR, hearing her heavy thoughts. He looks back at the city. He knew that it was neccessary. If they CF hadn't been dismantled, the Decepticons would probably be carrying its pieces back to their base right now. But still, he hadn't wanted to hurt IR by having the city built. He looks over at IR again.

-Its hard switching homes, but hopefully this one is permenant.- he says to her and gives her a small squeeze with the arm he had around her, reaching Maximal City and entering, guiding IR beside him.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> * IR sighed and felt the final drain of the Matrix's power, leaving her the 
> way she was before. As Iron Raptor, though still Arkness Prime.
> All but one of her modes was damaged, but it was well worth it.
> Though she looked back at Prowl and smiled, putting an arm around his 
> shoulders and walking along with him towards the city. < I love you too...>.
> But still she felt an ache in her spark, where the CF use to be. She had 
> grown to like that ship, though it kept getting beaten up.  She had thought 
> of it as a home, like she had the Ark.
> Now both were gone.
> It was hard, trying to settle in only to have your home taken away, or made 
> into something else.
> But this city could protect the Maximals better then the CF could,but still 
> she felt uneasy. Almost like she would rather sleep outside instead.*
> 
> 
> 
>
